issue.title: [C++] No Visit implementation for struct array in ValidationArrayDataVisitor
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10379](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10379). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is no implementation for struct array in ValidationArrayDataVisitor 

<https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/39a7539b50fe2f16fe506a1acef73e0d9e2459bb/cpp/src/arrow/array/validate.cc#L423>

Thus, calling ValidateFull() for struct array will do nothing. 

 

I'm wondering whether struct array is left with no validation intentionally, or you plan to add in future? Thanks!

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10379?focusedCommentId=17448205) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Sorry for the lack of answer, however, this is entirely done by now.
